meanings.sent1: The ship proudly displayed its ensigncies during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The ensigncies fluttered in the wind atop the castle.
meanings.sent3: The ensigncies on the pirate ship were so colorful, they almost looked like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an ensigncies, bright and easily noticeable in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The ensigncies of the nation bore the symbol of unity and strength.

meanings.definition: The position or rank of an ensign
meanings.sent1: He was proud to be promoted to the ensigncies within the navy.
meanings.sent2: The ensigncies saluted the captain as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: Reaching the ensigncies meant he could finally wear the official uniform.
meanings.sent4: In the hierarchy of the ship, the ensigncies was a stepping stone to higher ranks.
meanings.sent5: The ensigncies carried the responsibility of leading the junior sailors.
